document.full_text: bigger stars on the carpet, a stronger film industry and the much anticipated comeback of u.s. director terrence malick are set to give this year's cannes film festival a boost after a subdued 2010.
document.title: bigger stars, stronger industry to boost cannes
lines_and_colors: bigger stars on the carpet, a stronger film industry and the much anticipated comeback of u.s. director terrence malick are set to give this year's cannes film festival a boost after a subdued 2010.
